ofx:section.ofx:title: JBoss Application Server
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: JBoss Application Server, or simply JBoss, is an application server authored by JBoss, now developed by Red Hat. It is written in Java, and implements the Java Platform, Enterprise Edition (Java EE) specification. It runs on multiple platforms. The software is free and open-source software, subject to the requirements of the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL).
